author: dkhaywood
msg: #603: renamed NakedObjectClient to NakedObjectViewer, and renamed some of the methods in both NakedObjectViewer and ServerListener with a view to unifying them (NakedObjectViewer now inherits from ServerListener because it is a strict superset)

author: dkhaywood
msg: #603, pushed some more stuff into core/webapp, have also added #setAttribute and #getAttribute to AuthenticationSession so that we can use that instead of HttpSession as a place for viewers to put their 'stuff' (eg the Context object containing ObjectMappings)

author: dkhaywood
msg: bumped up version in application archetypes to 4.0-alpha-4-SNAPSHOT.

author: dkhaywood
msg: #603: Factor out webapp bootstrapping for reuse

ConfigurationLoader reworked to use new ResourceStreamSource interface which abstracts out where the InputStream comes from (eg FileInputStream or ServletContext).  The PropertiesReader hierarchy has been simplified.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Incomplete - # 603: Factor out webapp bootstrapping for reuse
fixing web.xml warning message (just the order of the elements).
